name: Community
description: Module for coordinating investment groups on HomeFi protocol.

functionDecorators.name: addMember
functionDecorators.description: Add a new member to an investment communityComprises of both request to join and join.

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: bytes - data encoded: - _communityID community count - _memberAddr member address to add.

parameterDecorators.name: _signature
parameterDecorators.description: bytes - _data signed by the community owner.

functionDecorators.name: communityDetails
functionDecorators.description: Return all info about a specific community.

parameterDecorators.name: _communityID
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the uuid (serial) of the community to query.

returnDecorators.description: address[] - array of all member accounts.
address[] - array of all projects the community can invest in.
uint256[] - array of interest rates with index relating to _projects.
uint256[] - array of starting date of debt repayments with index relating to _projects.
uint256[] - array of final date of debt repayment with index relating to _projects (double APR after).
uint256[] - array of amounts needed by projects before investment completes with index relating to _projects.

functionDecorators.name: createCommunity
functionDecorators.description: Create a new investment community on HomeFi.

parameterDecorators.name: _hash
parameterDecorators.description: bytes - the identifying hash of the community.

parameterDecorators.name: _currency
parameterDecorators.description: address - the currency accepted for creating new HomeFi debt tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: _forwarder
parameterDecorators.description: address of contract forwarding meta tx.

functionDecorators.name: publishProject
functionDecorators.description: Add a new project to an investment community. modifier onlyBuildermodifier checkMember.

parameterDecorators.name: _communityID
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the the uuid (serial) of the community being published to.

parameterDecorators.name: _project
parameterDecorators.description: address - the project contract being added to the community for investment.

parameterDecorators.name: _projectDetails
parameterDecorators.description: uint256[] - integer metadata for project - [0] = APR; [1]: Min repayment timestamp; [2]: Max repayment timestamp; [3]: investment needed - NOTE: APR is in per thousand. Ex: 5% interest => APR = 50.

functionDecorators.name: reduceDebt
functionDecorators.description: As an investor, if the repayment was done off platform then can mark their debt paid. modifier nonReentrant.

parameterDecorators.name: _communityID
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the the uuid of the community.

parameterDecorators.name: _project
parameterDecorators.description: address - the address of the deployed project contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _repayAmount
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the amount of funds repaid to the investor, in the project currency.

parameterDecorators.name: _details
parameterDecorators.description: bytes - some details on why debt is reduced (off chain documents or images).

functionDecorators.name: repayInvestor
functionDecorators.description: As a builder, repay an investor for their investment with interestthis is where funds flow out of contracts for investors. modifier onlyBuildermodifier nonReentrantmodifier nonZero(_investor)users MUST call approve on respective token contracts for the community contract firstIf the project's currency is native, then user can also pay in the native currencyby passing msg.value, it will be converted in to wrapped tokens internally.

parameterDecorators.name: _communityID
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the the uuid of the community.

parameterDecorators.name: _project
parameterDecorators.description: address - the address of the deployed project contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _investor
parameterDecorators.description: address - the address of the investor to repay + interest.

parameterDecorators.name: _repayAmount
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the amount of funds repaid to the investor, in the project currency.

functionDecorators.name: transferFraction
functionDecorators.description: Transfer ownership of investments from one user to anotherin practice transfer debt erc20 tokens + update references in custom nft logic. modifier nonReentrantmodifier nonZero(_to).

parameterDecorators.name: _communityID
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the the uuid (serial) of the community.

parameterDecorators.name: _project
parameterDecorators.description: address - the address of the deployed project contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _to
parameterDecorators.description: address - the address receiving ownership of the specified investments.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: amount of debt token he want to transfer.

returnDecorators.description: bool - will always return true if does not revert during execution.

functionDecorators.name: updateCommunityHash
functionDecorators.description: Update the internal identifying hash of a communityIDK why exactly this exists yet.

parameterDecorators.name: _communityID
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the the uuid of the community.

parameterDecorators.name: _hash
parameterDecorators.description: bytes - the new hash to update the community hash to.
